00037 CHTMLEntryDisplay::CHTMLEntryDisplay(){
00038     m_htmlHeader = "<html><head></head>";
00039     m_htmlBody = "</body></html>";
00040     m_includeHeader = true;
00041 }
00042 
00043 void CHTMLEntryDisplay::updateSettings(void){
00044     qWarning("CHTMLEntryDisplay::updateSettings(void)");
00045   m_highlightedVerseColorName = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::highlightedVerseColor).name();
00046     m_standardFontColorName         = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::textColor).name();
00047     m_swordRefColorName                 = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::swordRefColor).name();
00048 
00049   m_standardFontName = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::standard).family();
00050   m_standardFontSize = CToolClass::makeLogicFontSize(CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::standard).pointSize() );
00051 
00052     m_unicodeFontName  = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::unicode).family();
00053   m_unicodeFontSize  = CToolClass::makeLogicFontSize( CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::unicode).pointSize() );
00054 }
00055 
00057 char CHTMLEntryDisplay::Display(CSwordModuleInfo* module) {
00058     if (!module) {
00059         m_htmlText = QString::null;
00060         return -1;
00061     }
00062   //refresh font settings
00063     updateSettings();
00064     
00065     util::scoped_ptr<CSwordKey> key( CSwordKey::createInstance(module) );
00066     if (!key) {
00067         m_htmlText = QString::null;
00068         return 0;
00069     }   
00070     key->key( module->module()->KeyText() );
00071     
00072     CReferenceManager::Type refType = CReferenceManager::Unknown;
00073     if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible)
00074         refType = CReferenceManager::Bible;
00075     else if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary)
00076         refType = CReferenceManager::Commentary;
00077     else if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon)
00078         refType = CReferenceManager::Lexicon;
00079     else if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook)
00080         refType = CReferenceManager::GenericBook;
00081     
00082     if (m_includeHeader) {
00083         m_htmlText = m_htmlHeader;
00084 
00085         m_htmlText.append(QString::fromLatin1("<body><font color=\"%1\" face=\"%2\" size=\"%3\">")
00086             .arg(m_standardFontColorName)
00087       .arg( module->isUnicode() ? m_unicodeFontName : m_standardFontName)
00088             .arg( module->isUnicode() ? m_unicodeFontSize : m_standardFontSize));
00089 
00090         m_htmlText.append(QString::fromLatin1("<font color=\"%1\"><a href=\"%2\">%3: <b>%4</b></a></font><hr>%5")
00091             .arg(m_highlightedVerseColorName)
00092             .arg(CReferenceManager::encodeHyperlink(module->name(),key->key(), refType ))
00093             .arg(module->config(CSwordModuleInfo::Description))
00094             .arg(key->key())
00095             .arg(key->renderedText()));
00096 
00097         m_htmlText += QString::fromLatin1("</font>") + m_htmlBody;
00098     }
00099     else {
00100         m_htmlText = key->renderedText();
00101     }
00102 
00103 //clean up
00104 //  delete key;
00105     return 1;
00106 }
00107 
00109 char CHTMLEntryDisplay::Display( QList<CSwordModuleInfo>* moduleList) {
00110 //  qDebug("CHTMLEntryDisplay::Display( QList<CSwordModuleInfo>* moduleList)");
00111     if (!moduleList || (moduleList && !moduleList->count()) ) {
00112         m_htmlText = QString::null;
00113         return 0;
00114     }
00115     //reload font settings
00116     updateSettings();
00117 
00118     util::scoped_ptr<CSwordKey> key( CSwordKey::createInstance(moduleList->first()) );
00119         
00120     SWModule* module = moduleList->first()->module();
00121 //  ASSERT(module);
00122     QString usedKey = QString::null;
00123     CSwordModuleInfo *d = 0;    
00124     
00125     SWModule *m= (d = moduleList->first()) ? d->module() : 0;
00126     SWKey* sw = (SWKey*)(*module);
00127     key->key(*sw);  
00128     usedKey = key->key();
00129     m = (d = moduleList->first()) ? d->module() : 0;    
00130     while (m) {
00131     m = (d=moduleList->next()) ? d->module() : 0;
00132     if (m) {
00133             m->SetKey( (const char*)usedKey.local8Bit() );
00134         d->snap();          
00135         }
00136     }   
00137 
00138     const int width=(int)((double)100/(double)moduleList->count());
00139     m_htmlText = m_htmlHeader + QString::fromLatin1("<TABLE cellpadding=\"2\" cellspacing=\"0\"><TR>");     
00140     m_htmlText.append(QString("<font face=\"%1\" size=\"%2\" color=\"%3\">")
00141         .arg(m_standardFontName).arg(m_standardFontSize).arg(m_standardFontColorName));
00142     
00143     m = (d = moduleList->first()) ? d->module() : 0;        
00144     while (m) {
00145         key->module(d);
00146     if (m){
00147         m_htmlText.append(QString("<td width=\"%1\" bgcolor=\"#f1f1f1\"><b>%2 ")
00148                 .arg(width).arg(d->name()));
00149             m_htmlText.append(QString("(<font color=\"%1\" face=\"%2\" size=\"%3\">%4</font>)</b></td>")
00150                 .arg(m_highlightedVerseColorName)
00151         .arg((d && d->isUnicode() ) ? m_unicodeFontName : m_standardFontName)
00152             .arg((d && d->isUnicode() ) ? m_unicodeFontSize : m_standardFontSize)
00153             .arg(key->key())
00154             );
00155         }
00156         m = (d=moduleList->next()) ? d->module() : 0;           
00157     }
00158     m_htmlText.append(QString::fromLatin1("</TR>"));
00159             
00160     m = (d = moduleList->first()) ? d->module() : 0;
00161     m_htmlText += QString::fromLatin1("<TR>");
00162     while (m) {
00163         key->module(d);
00164         key->key(usedKey);
00165         
00166         m_htmlText +=
00167             QString::fromLatin1("<td width=\"%1%\"><FONT face =\"%2\" size=\"%3\">%4</font></td>")
00168                 .arg(width)
00169                 .arg((d && d->isUnicode() ) ? m_unicodeFontName : m_standardFontName)
00170                 .arg((d && d->isUnicode() ) ? m_unicodeFontSize : m_standardFontSize)
00171                 .arg(key->renderedText());
00172         m = (d = moduleList->next()) ? d->module() : 0;     
00173     }
00174     m_htmlText += QString::fromLatin1("</font></tr></table>") + m_htmlBody;
00175 
00176     //clean up
00177 //  delete key; 
00178     return 1;
00179 }
